main event: On September 6, 1967, Mr. Paul Miller and his wife observed a bright, disc-shaped UFO over their home in Lowell, Michigan.
interesting points: The object hovered silently for several minutes before rapidly accelerating and disappearing.,The object was described as being 50 feet in diameter and emitting a bright, steady light.,Witnesses observed the object for approximately 15 minutes.,The local police were notified, leading to an investigation by the Air Force's Project Blue Book.,The case was classified as 'unidentified' despite thorough investigation.
witness description: Mr. Paul Miller and his wife, Mrs. Marie Dewitt and her husband, Floyd Dewitt, and Gerald Grappers.
